title: Penetration rate of bottled water brands in Turkey 2012 to 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average penetration rate on the Y-axis for 20 different Responses for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2012 had the highest Average penetration rate for Response Hayat and 2012 had the lowest Average penetration rate for Response Volvic.
The maximum Average penetration rate for 2012 that was found in Response Hayat was 48.0 times larger than the minimum Average penetration rate observed in Response Volvic.
On average, the Response Hayat had the highest Average penetration rate for all 2 groups 2012, and 2013. Whereas Buxton had the lowest average Average penetration rate.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 20 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average penetration rate.
For Response Hayat, 2012 had the highest Average penetration rate 48.0 among the 2 groups and in Volvic, 2012 had the lowest Average penetration rate 0.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 20 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average penetration rate.
For Response Hayat, 2012 had the highest Average penetration rate 48.0 among the 2 groups and in Volvic, 2012 had the lowest Average penetration rate 0.0.
For Response Hayat, 2012 had the highest Average penetration rate among all 20 Responses and it has the lowest Average penetration rate in Response Volvic.
The maximum Average penetration rate for 2012 that was found in Response Hayat was 48.0 times larger than the minimum Average penetration rate observed in Response Volvic.
Among the groups, 2012 had the biggest difference in Average penetration rate. Where the maximum Average penetration rate was 48.0 times larger than the minimum Average penetration rate.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Response Hayat is the maximum Average penetration rate and Buxton is the minimum Average penetration rate.
